Estimate creatinine clearance and glomerular filtration rate using the Cockcroft-Gault formula

Source: R/renal_function.R
estimate_creatinine_clearance_cockcroft.Rd

The Cockcroft-Gault formula is: ...

estimate_creatinine_clearance_cockcroft(creatinine, age, is_female, weight)

Arguments

creatinine

Creatinine (\(μmol l^-1\)).
age

Age (years).
is_female

TRUE if patient is female, FALSE if patient is male.
weight

Weight (kg).

Value

eGFR (\(ml min^-1 1.73 m^2\)).

Caveats

None at this time.

References

None at this time.

See also

set_units, drop_units
